critique: The document aims to address economic development challenges in the Central San Joaquin Valley. As the President, I would want to elicit feelings of hope and optimism (joy) that the government is taking action to improve the situation. I would also anticipate some sadness or concern from those who feel the order doesn't go far enough or address their specific needs. There might be some surprise that this particular region is being focused on. Fear, disgust, and anger are less likely to be primary emotions elicited by this order, but some individuals might feel those emotions depending on their pre-existing views or concerns about government intervention.
